roleset.name: to make timid, fill with fear

example.name: autogen1
example.text: they will step up the campaign of arrests and intimidation against those who participated in the demonstrations
example.arg: against those who participated in the demonstrations

example.name: autogen2
example.text: intimidation of local correspondents -LRB- who filed reports to the network by phone , secret messengers or letters -RRB-
